howItWorks.conclusion: At the end of the challenge, you know where you stand, {emphasis}.

story1.text: It all started with a very simple search. One day, our founder typed:
story1.continuation: She found videos, courses, tutorials everywhere. But when it came time to take action, something was missing: clear explanations, without jargon, and above all

story2.text: Too much complexity, too much fear of making a mistake, too much pressure. That's when she understood one essential thing:
story2.highlight: The real problem is not a lack of information, but a lack of guidance.

story3.text: She then decided to create the tool she would have wanted herself. A
story3.continuation: that explains without judging and supports step by step.
story3.birth: With a developer sharing the same vision,
story3.birthEnd: was born. An intelligent assistant designed to make crypto more understandable, more human, and accessible to those who want to move forward with confidence.

iacoAssistant.title: Iaco, your AI assistant
iacoAssistant.intro: Iaco is here to help you understand crypto, simply. Throughout the entire challenge, it supports you step by step.

answers.title: Answers your questions
answers.description: Explains without jargon and helps you move forward without stress.

neverAlone.title: You are never alone
neverAlone.description: Learn at your own pace, without pressure or judgment.

noAccess.title: No access to your money
noAccess.description: Iaco has no access to your funds and gives no investment advice.

guidance.title: Just guidance
guidance.description: An intelligent assistant to understand, avoid mistakes, and move forward with confidence.

refund.title: Refund conditions
refund.promise: Our promise is simple: if you succeed in the challenge, you can be refunded.

criteria.intro: To validate success, you simply need to meet these objective conditions:
criteria.quiz: At least 80% on the final quiz

refund.conclusion: If these criteria are met, you can request your refund,
refund.reason: This guarantee exists for one reason only: to allow you to learn without pressure, with a clear and transparent framework.

security.title: Security, trust & compliance

noAdvice.title: No investment advice
noAdvice.description: Iaco is 100% educational. We help you understand crypto, not tell you what to buy.

noKeys.title: No private keys requested
noKeys.description: No seed phrase, no access to your accounts or your money.

private.title: Your data stays private
private.description: We don't share or sell your information. Ever.

control.title: Full control
control.description: Move at your own pace and stop at any time.

security.conclusionHighlight: just clear, honest, and transparent guidance
